page.title: 07LIFE STYLES
page.content: got to letter F.Drew a picture of a tree I saw at Brockhole.Then they came back from swimming and then we had dinner of fish burger and chips.After we played football.We did Spellaway till 3:20.Went to Cubs and played cricket.We had a talk about the Out ward Bound course.Played Action Force with Mark and Ross.Saw Darren Flying his kite.Ross had a go.Went to the river with Mark and Tim.The ice cream man came after tea.Had a drink of milk then went to bed. ______________________________________ A day in the life of Maria Dugdale Wednesday 19th June.Mum came to wake me up.I slid out of the top bunk and ran downstairs.I sat at the table and my breakfast was bread and jam after I went upstairs and got dressed washed and brushed my teeth.I went downstairs to watch television.But there was
